original: Beyer, Robert Theodor, konsul, Göteborg, f. 15/8/70 i Gbg av H. B. o. Fredrique Bartelt. G. m. Astrid Bergvall. Barn: Gunnar f. 09, dir. i firma Gunnar Beyer & Co. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 90, merk. stud. i uti. 92-93. Res. t. Engl. 89, Frankr. 92-93, Tyskl. årl. 04-14, Belg. 35, Ital. 37. Anst. i trä-varufirma A. J. Ljungqvist 90-91, h. James Dickson & Co. agenter i Paris 92-93, konsul :sekr. o. prokur. h. franske kons. i Gbg 94-01, etabl. agenturfirma Rob. Beyer 02, deläg. i firma Hugo Scharfenberg & Co. i Gbg 04-38, exp xhef h. A-B Pripp & Lyck-holm sed. 32. Led. av inskrmd i 20 år, rev. i hälsovind m. fl. komm. verk. Fransk konsularagent i Gbg 41-46. Medl. av Frimurarorden, Par Bricole, SHT o. Gnistan. Hobbies: fåglar, jakt, fiske. OffFrHL, OffFrd’A.
translated: Beyer, Robert Theodor, consul, Gothenburg, born August 15th, 1870 in Gothenburg, son of H. B. and Fredrique Bartelt. Married to Astrid Bergvall in 19xx. Children: Gunnar born in 1909, director in the company Gunnar Beyer & Co. He graduated from high school in Gothenburg in 1890, and was a noted student abroad in 1892-93. He traveled to England in 1889, France in 1892-93, Germany annually from 1904-1914, Belgium in 1935, and Italy in 1937. He was employed at the timber trading company A. J. Ljungqvist in 1890-91 and at James Dickson & Co. agents in Paris in 1892-93. He was secretary and procurator for the French consul in Gothenburg between 1894-1901 and established the agency firm Rob. Beyer in 1902. He was a shareholder in the firm Hugo Scharfenberg & Co. in Gothenburg from 1904-1938 and was an export manager for A-B Pripp & Lyckholm from 1932. He was a member of the city council for 20 years, as well as a member of the health commission and other community organizations. He was a French consular agent in Gothenburg from 1941-1946 and a member of the Freemason Order, Par Bricole, SHT and Gnistan. His hobbies included birdwatching, hunting, and fishing. He was awarded the French Legion of Honour (OffFrHL) and the French Order of Merit (OffFrd'A).

structured.name: Robert Theodor Beyer
additionalName: sekret. o. prokur. h. franske kons. i Gbg (Secretary and Procurator of the French Consul in Gothenburg)
